channel.title: Mobiles on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in Mobiles on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: Nokia G60 5G India Launch Confirmed, Pre-Booking to Commence Soon
item.description: Nokia G60 5G India Launch Confirmed, Pre-Booking to Commence Soon Nokia G60 5G is confirmed to launch in India soon.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy M23 5G, Galaxy A04, Galaxy A04e to launch in India soon as support pages go live
item.description: Samsung Galaxy M23 5G, Galaxy A04, Galaxy A04e to launch in India soon as support pages go live Samsung is gearing to launch a bunch of new M-series and A-series smartphones in India.

item.title: Haryana Police Identifies 28,000 Phone Numbers Being Used for Cybercrimes
item.description: Haryana Police Identifies 28,000 Phone Numbers Being Used for Cybercrimes About 28,000 mobile phone numbers being misused for committing cybercrimes have been identified and they will be blocked soon, a senior Haryana Police officer said on Thursday.

item.title: Google is reportedly working on the “Pixel G10” that has the same specs as the Pixel 7 Pro
item.description: Google is reportedly working on the “Pixel G10” that has the same specs as the Pixel 7 Pro Google recently launched the Pixel 7 series in India including the Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro smartphones.

item.title: One UI 5.0 update roll out scheduled released for a host of Samsung devices
item.description: One UI 5.0 update roll out scheduled released for a host of Samsung devices Samsung has announced the One UI 5.

item.title: Motorola Moto Razr 2022 flip phone arrives in Europe, India launch likely
item.description: Motorola Moto Razr 2022 flip phone arrives in Europe, India launch likely Motorola has announced the international release of its next-generation flagship foldable smartphone Moto Razr 2022, which comes with Qualcomms’ latest chipset, Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1.

item.title: Realme 10 Series Specifications Surface Again, Tipped to Launch in November
item.description: Realme 10 Series Specifications Surface Again, Tipped to Launch in November The TENAA listings of the Realme 10 5G and Realme 10 Pro+ 5G have been updated to reveal the specifications of the two smartphones.

item.title: Apple's App Store Said to Start Displaying More Ads From Today: Report
item.description: Apple’s App Store Said to Start Displaying More Ads From Today: Report While ads were previously visible in the App Store, the new ads appearing in the Today tab, will allow better visibility for advertisers, according to a report.

item.title: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch
item.description: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch Redmi Note 12 series is arriving on October 27 and the brand is building hype around it before the launch.

item.title: The iPhone 14 Pro Review: The Best iPhone Humankind Can Get, Yet!
item.description: The iPhone 14 Pro Review: The Best iPhone Humankind Can Get, Yet!
